TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SoapBindingStyle extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定發生於 XML Web Service 的動作類型，此服務位在套用這個列舉型別的類別階層架構層級上。

span.span: Specifies the type of action that occurs in the XML Web service at the level of the class hierarchy to which this enumeration is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別可讓使用者指定程序導向或文件導向傳輸訊息。This enumeration allows the user to specify whether the message being transmitted is procedure-oriented or document-oriented. 程序導向訊息含有參數和傳回值，而文件導向訊息包含文件。Procedure-oriented messages contain parameters and return values, while document-oriented messages contain documents. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CPP/soapprotocol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/CS/soapprotocol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding/VB/soapprotocol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle Default = int32(0)

summary.span: Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 檔案的目前階層架構層級的動作預設類型。

span.span: The default type of action for the current hierarchical level of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle Document = int32(1)

summary.span: 正在傳輸的訊息是文件導向。

span.span: The message being transmitted is document-oriented.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle Rpc = int32(2)

summary.span: 正在傳輸的訊息含有要從該程式呼叫程序或傳回值的參數。

span.span: The message being transmitted contains the parameters to call a procedure or the return values from that procedure.

summary.span: RPC 是遠端程序呼叫 (Remote Procedure Call) 的縮寫。

span.span: RPC is an acronym for "remote procedure call."
